text:
Hi, I'm Simon, a native Dane :flag-dk: living in Sweden at the beautiful island Gotland :desert_island:

Since 2005 I’ve been working within the digital sales and marketing landscape across B2B, SaaS and B2C segments.

Currently, CMO at Telness - a Swedish VC backed B2B SaaS Telecom. 

I also do consulting, helping B2B SaaS companies launch / scale in the Nordics (primarily Sweden and Denmark). 

Looking forward to learn from and engage with this community.

Happy to connect on <http://linkedin.com/in/simonhemph|LinkedIn>

text:
Hey folks, I’m Gordana, I’m a co-founder @ <https://workello.com/|Workello.com> and a director of content ops at a content marketing agency.

I’ve grown a content team from 0 to 45 after 7 years of freelance writing, and then built a product that helps other companies hire writers, because I personally struggled with it for years :slightly_smiling_face:

Very much looking forward to connect with other folks in content, learn new things, and help whomever I can with the experience I gained over the last several years :slightly_smiling_face:

Ping me if you need any help or advice on scaling a content team, building knowledge bases for writers, editors, and content managers, or anything about SEO :slightly_smiling_face:

And let’s connect on <https://www.linkedin.com/in/gordanasretenovic923/|LinkedIn> too!

Happy to be here!

text:
Hey everyone! I have been in the Superpath community for a while now and I am completely blown away by the knowledge and generosity of the people here.

I am a freelance content writer and I started my journey back in 2018 when I jumped onto the cryptocurrency bandwagon.

I have been hooked since then and been catering to clients across the globe in the crypto, NFT, Web3, Metaverse, and DAO space.

I primarily write long-form SEO focussed articles and I love that even though this industry is at an infancy stage there is so much to learn and write about.

So if you need someone to help you with content creation or simply want to bounce some ideas off of the crypto-verse or associated niches, I would love to connect!

I am excited to be a part of this community and I look forward to learning more from all of you! :)

You can find me on <https://www.linkedin.com/in/sharan-kaur-phillora/|LinkedIn> or explore my <https://sharanphillora.com/|portfolio>.

text: Hi everyone! I'm Tyler. I'm working on a side project to scratch my own itch that makes writing content easier and quicker. I first got into content writing after I found the juststart community on Reddit and was so amazed by the traffic I could get with just a few well researched blog posts. I'm more of a lurker so I hope to suck up as much knowledge as I can about content writing and marketing.

Hello everybody:wave:, I am Moh Arafat the founder / CEO of <https://dotit.org|Dot IT> the digital marketing agency based in Estonia and Egypt, I am passionate about creating an online solution that delights the user and drives profitable growth. With over 20 years of experience in digital project management.
Specialties: Web design & development, web management, digital marketing, SEO, and social media marketing.

text:
Hi all! My name is Christopher :wave: I’m a Content Strategist looking to network, identify freelance opportunities, and get some awesome content inspiration. I currently work as a Senior Editor at JPMC, but in the past I’ve:

:rolled_up_newspaper: Sat as Managing Editor of the now defunct <https://www.instagram.com/bobcutmag/?hl=en|Bob Cut Mag >
:robot_face: Shaped the voice of two different mental health <https://hopelab.org/product/vivibot/|chatbots>
:selfie: Grown LinkedIn Marketing’s <https://www.linkedin.com/showcase/linkedin-marketing-solutions/|social media> presence to 5M+

It’s great to meet all of you, and I’d love to <https://www.linkedin.com/in/christopherchanglloyd/|connect on LinkedIn> :star:️

text:
Hey all!:wave:

I am a social media strategist and comms professional.  I have worked with big and small clients, mostly B2C, in DC and New York. :city_sunset:
 I have also worked social media/created content for events with 15k in attendance in the states and Canada. I love learning about new trends, new methods of content creation, excited to learn from you all. I love working with nonprofit organizations and political organizations. Please reach out if you would be interested in working together. :inbox_tray:

When I am not on twitter, I love reading queer YA books and practicing my Spanish to visit my family in :flag-ec:.

In addition, selfish plug: I am on <https://www.linkedin.com/in/stephanierushford/|linkedin>
And <https://twitter.com/SMRushford|Twitter>, please send me your handles :slightly_smiling_face:

text:
Hi all  :waving-from-afar-left: I'm Mindy. I'm a longform content writer and editor looking for a full-time, remote position. I thrive in my current role because I am a creatively-driven person, but I also enjoy coaching writers and refining rough drafts. For more information on my background and experience, please review my <https://www.linkedin.com/in/mindy-hayes-01276225/|linkedin profile> or my <http://www.harthayes.wordpress.com/|portfolio>.
In my free time, I like to bake, watch TV, play videogames, and do art projects. My husband and I live in Maine with our 15-year-old husky mutt :wolf: and are expecting our first child late this summer. I look forward to connecting with you!

text: Good evening Superpath community :wave: . My name is Will Dobbs and I am from Tucson, Arizona. Presently, I am a social media specialist and  digital content creator at a retirement community. I look forward to getting to know everyone and learn further about Content marketing careers. Away from work, I am an avid runner and marathon runner and a backpacker and paddleboarder.
